review: The Fire TV Stick is amazingly easy to set up, and the range is phenomenal.  It is perfect for the wall TV in the basement.  And it works with the voice remote from the fire TV and the gaming controllers.  It streams movies without pausing or hiccups, just like the bigger box version.  My only complaint is that the power source plugs in on the side, instead of the end, but they provide a short extender so if you can't power it up because HDMI cables are on both sides, it can pop out a little so you don't have to waste an HDMI slot to make room to plug it in.
author: Dinubabear
